meanings.definition: Feeling or inspiring optimism or confidence
meanings.sent1: She had a hopeful smile on her face as she waited for the results.
meanings.sent2: The team was hopeful about winning the championship this year.
meanings.sent3: The hopeful puppy wagged its tail eagerly, waiting for a treat.
meanings.sent4: The sun peeked through the clouds, casting a hopeful light on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed with hopeful colors, promising a beautiful spring ahead.

meanings.definition: A person who has hope; optimist
meanings.sent1: He was a hopeful who believed in the power of positive thinking.
meanings.sent2: The hopeful always saw the silver lining in every situation.
meanings.sent3: The little hopeful cheered up everyone with his infectious optimism.
meanings.sent4: She was a beacon of hope in the community, a true hopeful.
meanings.sent5: The group of hopefuls gathered together to spread positivity and encouragement.
